com.sensiya.brainssdk.api

Class BrainsAPI

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sensiya.brainssdk.api.BrainsAPI

  • public class BrainsAPI
extends java.lang.Object
    todo: document this

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  BaseBrainsAPI.ActivityRecognition
      ActivityRecognition helper used to retrieve the activity type and confidence from the received ACTION_USER_ACTIVITY_CHANGED SDK intent
      static class  BaseBrainsAPI.GeoFencing
      To add a new geo fence call one of the add methods, example:
      BrainsAPI.GeoFencing.add("my geo",0,0);
      will add a new geo fence with id "my geo" for the geo point [0,0] with radius 100 (default).
      static class  BaseBrainsAPI.ParkingSpot
      Parking helper used to retrieve the parking location form the received ACTION_PARKED intent

      static java.util.List<AppCategory> getAppCategories()
      Returns list of app categories statistics Note: This is a blocking method, so you better not call it on the main (UI) thread.

        public static java.util.List<AppCategory> getAppCategories()
        Returns list of app categories statistics Note: This is a blocking method, so you better not call it on the main (UI) thread.

      • getAppUsage

        public static java.util.List<AppInfo> getAppUsage(int limit,
                                  AppInfo.Options options)
        Returns a list of apps and its usage statistics, filtered according to days usage, time and location. Note: This is a blocking method, so you better not call it on the main (UI) thread.
        Parameters:
        limit - maximum number of apps that would be returned.
        options - options for filtering the results.
        Returns:
        list of the current apps usage

      • getAverageTimeFromHomeToWork

        public static long getAverageTimeFromHomeToWork(int dayOfWeek)
        Returns the average time it takes user to get from home to work Note: This is a blocking method, so you better not call it on the main (UI) thread.
        Parameters:
        dayOfWeek - the day of week the user travels from home to work
        Returns:
        average time it takes user to get from home to work

      • getAverageTimeFromWorkToHome

        public static long getAverageTimeFromWorkToHome(int dayOfWeek)
        Returns the average time it takes user to get from work to home Note: This is a blocking method, so you better not call it on the main (UI) thread.
        Parameters:
        dayOfWeek - the day of week the user travels from work to home
        Returns:
        average time it takes user to get from work to home

      • start

        public static void start(Context context,
         BrainsAPICallback callback)
        Start the SDK, when the application key is integrated in the manifest file
        Parameters:
        context - application context
        callback - callback to be called once the SDK is ready for usage
